'''13w25a''' is the fifteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on June 17, 2013<ref>{{tweet|dinner|345524614216163328}}</ref>.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* [[Mobs]] named "Dinnerbone" or "Grumm" are now flipped upside down.

=== Items ===
'''[[Golden apple]]s'''
* Absorption time has been increased from 1 minute and 30 seconds to 2 minutes.
